queries.description: This will work on all Mortar building graphs. Finds all nodes that are a subclass of brick:Point.
queries.retrieved_information: List of all nodes that has a type of a subclass of "Brick:Point"

questions.text: What are the brick points in this graph?
Can you find nodes that has information about an external reference?
What points does this graph have?
What data sources I have in my system?
Which entities that are instances of Point (including its subclasses) have which types?
What point entities exist and what types are they assigned?
List all measurement points along with their categories.
What data points are defined in the building model and how are they classified?
Which data points does the system include and how are they grouped?

queries.description: This will work on all Mortar building graphs. Finds all equipment and its Zone Air Temperature Setpoints.
queries.retrieved_information: All Zone Air Temperature Setpoints with the equipment they're connected to

questions.text: Find all equipment and its points that are Zone Air Temperature Setpoints
What equipment has setpoints for zone air temperature and what are they?
What are the Zone Air Temperature Setpoints and the equipment they belong to?
Which equipment regulates the air temperature in rooms
For each point that is a zone air temperature setpoint, which equipment has that point?
Which devices include points that set the air temperature in a zone, and what are those points?
Which HVAC components provide setpoints for regulating zone air temperature and what are those setpoints called?
What are the target temperatures for each zone and which devices supply these targets?
Which equipment controls the temperature settings for building zones?

queries.description: This will work on all Mortar building graphs. Finds all equipment and its Supply Air Temperature Sensors.

questions.text: Find all equipment and its points that are Supply Air Temperature Sensors

queries.description: This will work on all Mortar building graphs. Finds all equipment and its Zone Air Temperature Sensors.
queries.retrieved_information: All Zone Air Temperature Sensors with the equipment they're connected to

questions.text: Find all equipment and its points that are Zone Air Temperature Sensors
What equipment has sensors for zone air temperature and what are they?
What are the Zone Air Temperature Sensors and the equipment they belong to?
Which zone air temperature sensor instances are connected by has point to which equipment?
Which pieces of equipment include a sensor that measures the air temperature in a zone?
What devices are fitted with zone temperature sensors and what are those sensors?
Where can I find the equipment that provides measurements of temperature in each zone?
Which devices monitor the temperature in the building zones?

queries.description: This will work on all Mortar building graphs. Finds zone air temperature sensors and setpoints linked to the same equipment.
queries.sparql_query: SELECT ?sensor ?sp ?equip WHERE { ?sensor rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Zone_Air_Temperature_Sensor . ?sp rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Zone_Air_Temperature_Setpoint . ?equip brick:hasPoint ?sp . ?equip brick:hasPoint ?sensor . }
queries.retrieved_information: All related Zone Air Temperature Sensors and Setpoints together with the equipment that they're both connected to. Purpose is to compare the difference between real temperature and desired temperature

questions.text: Which zone air temperature sensors and setpoints are linked to the same equipment?
Find all connected pairs of Zone Air Temperature Sensors and Setpoints
Which equipment has a zone air temperature sensor and a zone air temperature setpoint, and what are the names of those sensor and setpoint points?
For each HVAC unit, what temperature sensor is installed and what setpoint does it have for controlling room air temperature?
What measurement and target temperature points are associated with each device that manages zone air temperature?
Which devices control the air temperature in building zones, and what sensors and desired values do they use?
How are room temperature measurements and their target values defined across the building’s equipment?

queries.description: This will work on all Mortar building graphs. Finds all sensors and setpoints connected to the same equipment.
queries.sparql_query: SELECT ?sensor ?sp ?equip WHERE { ?sensor rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Sensor . ?sp rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Setpoint . ?equip brick:hasPoint ?sp . ?equip brick:hasPoint ?sensor . }
queries.retrieved_information: All related Sensors and Setpoints together with the equipment that they're both connected to. Purpose is to compare the difference between real sensor values and desired settings

questions.text: Find all sensor and setpoints connected to the same equipment
Find all related sensor and setpoints pairs
Which brick sensors and brick setpoints are connected to the same equipment?
For each piece of equipment that has points, what sensor and what setpoint are linked to it via the has point relationship?
For every device, which measurement instrument and which control value does it include?
Which assets combine a monitoring device with an adjustable target value?
What equipment units offer both sensing functionality and settable thresholds?
Which devices in the system support both readings and configuration settings?

queries.description: This will work on all updated Mortar building graphs because originals don't have Heating_Command type, instead they use Command type. Finds all AHUs and their connected Cooling and Heating command points.
queries.sparql_query: SELECT ?cooling_point ?heating_point ?ahu WHERE { ?ahu rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Air_Handling_Unit . ?cooling_point rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Cooling_Command . ?heating_point rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Heating_Command . ?ahu brick:hasPoint ?cooling_point . ?ahu brick:hasPoint ?heating_point . }
queries.retrieved_information: Find all AHUs and their connected Cooling and Heating command points. Purpose is to check if they're open at the same time, which is a fault that results in wasted energy

questions.text: Which AHUs have both a Cooling Valve Command and a Heating Command point?
Find all AHUs with heating and cooling command points
Which air handler units have both a cooling and heating command?
Is there any simultaneous heating and cooling fault in any of my AHUs?
Which air handling unit has point a cooling command and has point a heating command, and what are those points?
Which air handling unit provides both a cooling command point and a heating command point, and what are those points?
For each air handling unit, list its cooling and heating command points.
Which control points handle cooling and heating in air handling units?
How can I find the temperature control setpoints for the air handling equipment?

queries.description: This will work on all updated Mortar building graphs because originals don't have Building_Electrical_Meter, instead they have Building_Electric_Meter. Finds all Building electrical meters and outside air temperature sensors.
queries.sparql_query: SELECT ?meter ?oat WHERE { ?meter rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Building_Electrical_Meter . ?oat rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Outside_Air_Temperature_Sensor . }
queries.retrieved_information: Find all Building Electrical Meters and OAT sensors in the building. Only works if both are present. The purpose is to compare outside air temperature with electricity consumption

questions.text: Find all Building electrical meters and outside air temperature sensors in my building
Which electric meters and OAT sensors are present in the building system?
Which meters and weather sensors are present in the building system?
How can I compare the weather with electricity consumption?
What are the building electrical meters and what are the outside air temperature sensors?
Which devices serve as building power meters and which ones measure outside air temperature?
Which electricity meters in the building and which outdoor temperature sensors are available?
List all electricity usage meters alongside the devices that record outside air temperature.
What devices monitor electricity consumption and outdoor temperature?

queries.description: Finds temperature sensors connected to VAVs that serve HVAC zones.
queries.sparql_query: SELECT ?temp_sensor ?vav ?zone WHERE { ?vav rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:VAV . ?vav brick:hasPoint ?temp_sensor . ?temp_sensor rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* brick:Temperature_Sensor . ?vav brick:feeds+ ?zone . ?zone rdf:type brick:HVAC_Zone }
queries.retrieved_information: Find all rooms, the VAVs that feeds them and the room (in terms of hvac_zone) that contains the VAV

questions.text: Which temperature sensors are connected to VAVs that serve HVAC zones?
List all temperature sensors and the VAVs and zones they are part of.

Which areas receive airflow from terminals that include temperature sensors?
How is temperature monitored across the different HVAC zones in the building?
